comments:
Oh boy, I know you guys are about to freeze the code, and I got one more bug.

I have an external C++ project, which I imported via Navigator-View->Import...
Then I tried the "Convert to Make Project"-Wizard to get an valid C++ Project.
When hitting the "Finish"-Button, an Error-Dialog appears telling me:
----------
Project cannot be created.
Reason:
  Internal Error:
----------

Everytime, the .log has an new entry:
